title: Loan
description: Test your knowledge about loans with these multiple-choice questions.

questions.question: What is the definition of a loan?

answers.answer: A financial transaction where money is borrowed and must be paid back with interest

questions.question: What is collateral in the context of loans?

answers.answer: The interest rate charged on the loan
The term used for a loan that doesn't require repayment
Property or assets that a borrower offers to secure a loan
The bank that provides the loan

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of an unsecured loan?
What is the term for the interest rate that doesn't change over the life of the loan?
What does it mean if a loan has a prepayment penalty?

answers.answer: You can pay it off early without any additional fees
You can only make payments on it at specific times
You must pay a fee if you pay it off before the agreed-upon time
The interest rate increases if you miss a payment

questions.question: What type of loan is typically used to purchase a home?
Which of the following factors influences the interest rate on a loan?

answers.answer: The length of the loan term

questions.question: What is the grace period on a loan?

answers.answer: The time when interest starts accruing on the loan
The period after the due date during which a payment can still be made without penalty
The time when the loan amount is disbursed
The period before the loan is approved
